title: Remove trailing slash error check for OutputPath and BaseOutputPath
body:
This should unblock our insertions

Release here: https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_releaseProgress?_a=release-pipeline-progress&releaseId=903711

commit.message: Remove error checks for OutputPath and BaseOutputPath having trailing slashes

nodes.body: These validations are required. It's best to find and fix the root cause rather than removing this logic. So, please do revert this when you guys have a fix in the VS Repo.
